text: allatu, avarkal allahvaiyanri (veru) teyvankalai etuttuk kontirukkirarkala? "Appatiyayin, unkal attatciyai ninkal kontu varunkal; ito ennutan iruppavarkalin vetamum, enakku munpu iruntavarkalin vetamum irukkinrana" enru napiye! Nir kurum; anal avarkalil perumpalor cattiyattai arintu kollavillai akave avarkal (ataip) purakkanikkirarkal
